Name: FootLOL: Epic Soccer League
About the game: We all love soccer – but how badly do you want to win? FootLOL is the craziest soccer management game you have ever played! Use mines, aliens, cows, guns and other crazy cheats to decimate the opposing team and protect your players. Play against your friends or AI opponents! As the manager, you’ll take your team through a few training matches on Earth before being unleashed on new planets. During you trip to the stars, you’ll unlock new gadgets, improve your players’ performance, as well as buy new kits and hats for them to wear. Opponents often use the same tricks you do, so it’s not as simple as knocking the ball in the back of the net. You’ll also need to fulfil the various head-scratching conditions for each level! Thankfully, non-stop action, funny characters and the best arsenal seen in a football game ever are at your service. Once you’ve finished FootLOL’s tournament mode, you can play against the computer or go online for gripping multiplayer matches. Game Features: Four planets, each with several types of playing field Multiplayer Hilarious soccer chaos Highly customizable characters and teams Sixty levels Crazy abilities and tools
